mapper.select:
select distinct oi.org_info_committee_province from organization_information oi where oi.org_info_committee_province is not null and oi.org_info_committee_province != '' and oi.org_info_type_id = #{orgInfoTypeId}
and oi.org_info_parent_id = #{orgInfoId}

select distinct oi.org_info_committee_city from organization_information oi where oi.org_info_committee_city is not null and oi.org_info_committee_city != '' and oi.org_info_committee_province = #{orgInfoCommitteeProvince}
and oi.org_info_parent_id = #{orgInfoId}

select distinct oi.org_info_committee_area from organization_information oi where oi.org_info_committee_area is not null and oi.org_info_committee_area != '' and oi.org_info_committee_city = #{orgInfoCommitteeCity}
and oi.org_info_parent_id = #{orgInfoId}
